content: the prototype is the skill jumpy dumpty of the character klee in the game genshin impact video tutorial https //youtu be/em7gccndhhi materials 2mm crochet hook 4ply cotton yarn nonwoven fabric fiberfill stuffing embroidery floss fabric glue embroidery needle yarn needle pins abbreviations chain-chain sl-slip_stitch k- skip x-single_crochet v-increase stitch a-decrease stitch w-3 single_crochet increase t- half_double_crochet f- half_double_crochet flo- front loop only blo- back loop only magic_ring-magic_ring n … -repeat n times whatever is in between the square brackets … -everything in brackets works in one stitch
